english.segment1: Burning bridges. Burning bridges. Shut myself off from the world. Burning bridges. Burning bridges. Shut myself off from life
english.segment2: As the ashes fall. As the ashes fall. Through the fire. Through the flame. [X2]
english.segment4: I won't look back. To the chains that bound me. [X2]
english.segment5: I will lay to rest my ghosts. And cover my footsteps. I will stand up straight and walk away. Leaving them far behind
english.segment6: Won't look back. Chains that bound me.
